answers.answer: You don't have HIV,you are conclusively HIV negative.Testing after 3 months is considered conclusive,and you tested after one year.Yes sometimes it takes years to show HIV symptoms if infected.But HIV testing is conclusive after three months.Move on and enjoy your life!

question: I was wondering how long does it take after having sexual contact with an affected person can the doctors tell if you're positive or negative for HIV?  I was seeing a guy and had sex with him one time and he pulled the condom off without me knowing and now I'm scaredt a year after that I got tested for HIV and it came out negative. Should I be worry because I thought they say sometime it takes years til HIV show symptoms so can a doctor tell if I have HIV if its been a year after the unprotected sex?? PLease please reply it would stress me out so much I have diabetes too and I really don't want to stress out about this stuff too.
title: how long does it take to know if you're positive or negative for HIV?
